name: Introduction to Mathematics
description: Introduces the fundamentals of Mathematics, such as basic logic, set theory, and proofs

name: Algebra
description: Introduces the fundamentals of Algebra, such as linear equations, polynomials, and matrices

name: Calculus
description: Introduces the fundamentals of Calculus, such as derivatives, integrals, and limits

name: Statistics
description: Introduces the fundamentals of Statistics, such as descriptive statistics, probability, and hypothesis testing

name: Advanced Mathematics
description: Introduces the fundamentals of Advanced Mathematics, such as numerical analysis, combinatorics, and graph theory
